code: import*as React from'react';import{useTheme as useThemeBase,ThemeColors}from'react-navigation';export default function useTheme(){var theme=useThemeBase();return React.useMemo(function(){var colors=ThemeColors[theme];var dark=theme==='dark';return{dark:dark,colors:{primary:dark?'rgb(10, 132, 255)':'rgb(0, 122, 255)',background:dark?'rgb(1, 1, 1)':'rgb(242, 242, 242)',card:colors.header,text:colors.label,border:colors.headerBorder}};},[theme]);}
